attributes
The attributes that should be included in the serialization of each model in this collection. If none given, all attributes unique to each model is included.
var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({ model: Dog }); var dogs = new Dogs([ {id: 1, "name": "Fido"}, {id: 2, "name": "Skip"}, {id: 3, "name": "Bump"} ]); console.log( dogs.serialize() ); // => [{id: 1, name: "Fido"}, {id: 2, name: "Skip"}, {id: 3, name: "Bump"}] console.log( dogs.serialize(["name"]) ); // => [{name: "Fido"}, {name: "Skip"}, {name: "Bump"}]
